alert.note: Alert for Athens; Vinton (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 17 at 5:09PM EDT by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Perry, southwestern Morgan, northeastern Vinton and northwestern Athens Counties through 545 PM EDT... At 508 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles south of Logan, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Nelsonville, Glouster, Shawnee, Chauncey, New Straitsville, Corning, Buchtel, Jacksonville, Murray City, Trimble, Hemlock, Rendville, Burr Oak State Park and The Plains. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
